content:
# I have successfully crafted one wooden chest and now have 10 units of wood remaining in my inventory. This is a good start for setting up a basic storage system.

# Next, I will craft a basic inserter to automate the movement of items into the wooden chest. The recipe for a basic inserter requires 1 iron plate and 1 wooden chest.

# First, I need to check if I have any iron plates in my inventory.

current_inventory = inspect_inventory()
iron_needed = 1
current_iron = current_inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0)

if current_iron >= iron_needed:
    # Proceed to craft one basic inserter
    craft_item(Prototype.BasicInserter, quantity=1)
else:
    # If not enough iron plates, I need to locate a nearby iron resource patch to gather iron.
    iron_resource_position = nearest(Resource.Iron)
    move_to(iron_resource_position)
    harvest_resource(iron_resource_position, quantity=10)  # Gather enough iron to craft the inserter.
    
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")
